title: Vivian

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Shade Fist**: Punch an enemy, if they survive, they will burn the next round, which will deal a Powerful attack.
- **Veil**: Pick someone, you will learn the names of all their visitors, and attacking actions will fail on them (2 uses)
- **Infatuate**: Confuse someone, they will randomly be redirected to a neighbor. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You are immune to attacks and negative effects from players you targeted previously.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose Lord Bowser.

*That's Vivian, She's the youngest of the three Shadow Sirens.*
